name: pocico
description:
A puzzle game about changing states.

Check out the demo below to see if this game is for you.

The game is in Early Access. It is available for Windows and macOS.

(Please use the itch app to install on macOS.) 

Versions for iOS, Android, and GNU/Linux  are planned. 

I am updating the game often. Please see the devlogs for information on the latest updates. The price might increase as the game matures. (You will not lose access to the game even if the price increases).

If something doesn't work or you have any questions/comments, please use the forums below.

Instructions

You only need the mouse to play. Click on shapes to change their color/state. The goal is to match the outer color with the inner color in every shape. Every puzzle has its own rules. The colors always change in the same order. The more colors you decide to play with, the harder the game gets. You can have up to 9 colors at once.

The game doesn't force you to play a certain way. You are free to play any puzzle you want immediately.

Move your mouse over to the bottom of the screen to reveal useful buttons.

In order from left to right, the buttons let you: play again with a new pattern, randomize the colors, increase / decrease the number of colors, grow and shrink some puzzles, select the puzzle you want to play, and return to the main menu.

A special note: The colored die (the second button) also shows the order that the colors will change in. Also, when a puzzle can not grow / shrink, the buttons for growing and shrinking are not visible.
